thumbnails.reason: A powerful side body lock demonstrates raw strength and control early in the match, with both wrestlers' muscles engaged.
thumbnails.suggested_caption: Locked up tight from the start.
thumbnails.label: control
thumbnails.why_high_ctr: Shows immediate, powerful grappling control and muscular strain.

thumbnails.reason: A quick and decisive leg lock submission ends the first round, with a clear tap-out visible.
thumbnails.suggested_caption: He tapped out to the leg lock!
thumbnails.label: submission_threat
thumbnails.why_high_ctr: A sudden and painful-looking submission finish creates high drama.

thumbnails.reason: A dominant, chest-to-chest pin attempt with the opponent completely flattened and struggling under heavy pressure.
thumbnails.suggested_caption: Crushing pressure from the top position.
thumbnails.label: near_fall
thumbnails.why_high_ctr: Classic top control and pinning dominance is a core wrestling appeal.

thumbnails.reason: A technical crucifix-style control completely neutralizes the opponent's arms, showcasing superior positioning and helplessness.
thumbnails.suggested_caption: Trapped and helpless in a crucifix.
thumbnails.label: control
thumbnails.why_high_ctr: Highlights technical skill and a dominant, inescapable hold.

thumbnails.reason: An intense face smother from the mount demonstrates a primal and overwhelming form of dominance, with the bottom man's struggle evident.
thumbnails.suggested_caption: He can't breathe under that pressure.
thumbnails.label: dominance
thumbnails.why_high_ctr: Raw, intense dominance from a top position is highly engaging.

thumbnails.reason: A classic wrestling cradle stacks the opponent, putting immense pressure on his neck and back for a pin attempt.
thumbnails.suggested_caption: Locked in a tight, powerful cradle.
thumbnails.label: near_fall
thumbnails.why_high_ctr: A traditional and powerful pinning combination is instantly recognizable to fans.

thumbnails.reason: A textbook pin attempt with heavy shoulder pressure, forcing the opponent's back to the mat and showing clear tension.
thumbnails.suggested_caption: Nowhere to go, shoulders are flat.
thumbnails.label: near_fall
thumbnails.why_high_ctr: The clear tension of a near-fall situation is a peak moment in wrestling.

thumbnails.reason: A complex submission attempt trapping both an arm and a leg, showcasing flexibility and a painful-looking hold.
thumbnails.suggested_caption: Twisted up in a painful submission.
thumbnails.label: submission_threat
thumbnails.why_high_ctr: An unusual and visually compelling submission hold sparks curiosity.

thumbnails.reason: A classic rear-naked choke is sunk in deep, showing a clear end-of-match threat with visible strain on the defender's face.
thumbnails.suggested_caption: The choke is locked in tight!
thumbnails.label: submission_threat
thumbnails.why_high_ctr: This iconic submission hold creates immediate drama and anticipation.

thumbnails.reason: A clear victory pose with the winner flexing his biceps over his exhausted and defeated opponent, asserting dominance.
thumbnails.label: victory
thumbnails.why_high_ctr: A definitive display of dominance and victory is a powerful and satisfying image.
